doc.title: A War Within
doc.plot: Still haunted over the death of his unborn baby, Ray Berks has grown distant from his wife, Karen. But as Ray tries to rekindle his marriage, the truth of Karen's illicit affair surfaces. Faced with the reality of starting over, Ray tries to pull the pieces of his marriage back together and recover the relationship with his seventeen year-old son, Michael. But with everyone struggling with their own "war within", the path that lies ahead leads to a fateful ending...
